reports.title: Select SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Runs on HW
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100})-[e:RUNS_ON]-(m:NTG6_HU_HW) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: Used in model lines
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100})-[e:USED_IN_MODEL_LINE]-(m:MODEL_LINE) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: All SWs directly updating to it
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]-(m:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: All SWs updating to it
reports.query: MATCH path = (from:NTG6_HU_SW)-[:UPDATES_TO*]->(to:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100}), (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100}) RETURN DISTINCT *

reports.title: All SWs it directly updates to
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100})-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(m) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) OR n.title=$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100 RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: All SWs it updates to
reports.query: MATCH path = (from:NTG6_HU_SW{title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100})-[:UPDATES_TO*]->(to:NTG6_HU_SW), (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100}) RETURN DISTINCT *

reports.title: Properties
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW) WHERE n.title=$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100 RETURN n.title AS Title, n.sgenComment AS `SGen comment`, n.release AS Release, n.productionSW AS `Production SW`, n.fieldSW AS `Field SW`, n.otaSW AS `OTA SW`, n.vehicles AS Vehicles, n.huMarkets AS Markets, n.tvDevice AS `TV device`, n.notes AS Notes

reports.title: China properties
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW) WHERE n.title=$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100 RETURN n.cnBranch AS `CN branch`, n.productionSWCN AS `Production SW CN`, n.fieldSWCN AS `Field SW CN`, n.otaSWCN AS `OTA SW CN`

reports.title: Coding data versions
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW) WHERE n.title=$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_100 RETURN n.codingDataVersionEntry AS `Coding data version Entry`, n.codingDataVersionMid AS `Coding data version Mid`, n.codingDataVersionHigh AS `Coding data version High`

reports.title: Select start SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Select end SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: SW update relationship
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_200})-[e]-(m:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_201}) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: SW relationship details
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_200})-[e]-(m:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_201}) RETURN e.updateStatus AS `Update status`, e.updateStatusCN AS `Update status CN`, e.campaignStatus AS `Campaign status`, e.campaignStatusCN AS `Campaign status CN`, e.size AS Size, e.campaignMarkets AS Markets, e.otaVariantCoding AS `OTA variant coding`, e.bootloaderRequired AS `Bootloader required`, e.tvDevicesOnly AS `TV devices only`, e.rolloutCostsTBD AS `Rollout costs tbd`, e.notes AS Notes

reports.title: Select HW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_HW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: HW version to show all SWs running on it

reports.title: All SWs running on it
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:RUNS_ON]->(m:NTG6_HU_HW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_hw_title_300}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: Select SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: SW version to show used in model line relationship

reports.title: Select model line
reports.query: MATCH (n:`MODEL_LINE`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: Model line to show used in model line relationship

reports.title: Used in model line relationship
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_301})-[e:USED_IN_MODEL_LINE]->(m:MODEL_LINE {title:$neodash_model_line_title_302}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: Used in model line relationship details
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_301})-[e:USED_IN_MODEL_LINE]->(m:MODEL_LINE {title:$neodash_model_line_title_302}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN e.introductionTime AS `Introduction time`, e.huLines AS `HU lines`, e.markets AS Markets, e.partNumbersEntry AS `Part numbers Entry`, e.partNumbersMid AS `Part numbers Mid`, e.partNumbersHigh AS `Part numbers High`, e.testRelease AS `Test release`

reports.title: Select SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: SW version to show runs on relationship

reports.title: Select HW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_HW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: HW version to show runs on relationship

reports.title: Runs on relationship
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_303})-[e:RUNS_ON]->(m:NTG6_HU_HW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_hw_title_304}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: Runs on relationship details
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_303})-[e:RUNS_ON]->(m:NTG6_HU_HW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_hw_title_304}) WHERE (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN e.markets AS `Markets`, e.hwPartNumbersEntry AS `HW part numbers Entry`, e.hwPartNumbersMid AS `HW part numbers Mid`, e.hwPartNumbersHigh AS `HW part numbers High`

reports.title: Select start SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Start SW runs on HW
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:RUNS_ON]->(m:NTG6_HU_HW) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_400 RETURN m.title AS `HW version` ORDER BY m.title

reports.title: Select end SW version
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value,  n.`title` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: End SW runs on HW
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:RUNS_ON]->(m:NTG6_HU_HW) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_401 RETURN m.title AS `HW version` ORDER BY m.title

reports.title: Shortest path
reports.query: MATCH path=shortestPath((source:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_400})-[:UPDATES_TO*]->(target:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_401})) RETURN path

reports.title: Common HW along the path (if any)
reports.query: MATCH path=shortestPath((source:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_400})-[:UPDATES_TO*]->(target:NTG6_HU_SW {title:$neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_401})), (m:NTG6_HU_HW) WHERE ALL (x IN nodes(path) WHERE (x)-[:RUNS_ON]->(m)) RETURN DISTINCT m.title AS `HW version` ORDER BY m.title

reports.title: All running campaigns
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(m:NTG6_HU_SW) WHERE e.campaignStatus='Currently running OTA update campaign' OR e.campaignStatus='Currently running' RETURN n, e, m

reports.title: Pick release to show all SWs
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_RELEASE`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: SOP, FUP1, FUP2, FUP3 or FUP4

reports.title: All connected SWs of the release
reports.query: MATCH (a:NTG6_HU_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(b:NTG6_HU_SW) WHERE $neodash_release_to_show_all_sws_500 IN ['SOP', 'FUP1', 'FUP2', 'FUP3', 'FUP4'] AND a.release = $neodash_release_to_show_all_sws_500 + ' SW release' AND b.release = $neodash_release_to_show_all_sws_500 + ' SW release' RETURN a, e, b

reports.title: Select SW version
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Select HU line
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_LINE`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value,  n.`title` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: HU line to show modules (Entry, Mid, or High)

reports.title: Select market
reports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG6_HU_MARKET`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: Market to show modules (ECE, USA, Asia, or Japan)

reports.title: HW
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_MODULE_HW)-[e:HAS_MODULE_HW_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG6_HU_MODULE_HW_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_600 AND $neodash_ntg6_hu_line_title_601 IN m.huLines AND $neodash_ntg6_hu_market_title_602 IN m.markets RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.hwVersion AS `HW version`, m.huLines AS `HU lines`, m.dialogName AS `Dialog name`, m.markets AS Markets, m.modelLines AS `Model lines`

reports.title: BOOT
reports.query: MATCH (n:NTG6_HU_MODULE_BOOT)-[e:HAS_MODULE_BOOT_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG6_HU_MODULE_BOOT_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg6_hu_sw_title_600 AND $neodash_ntg6_hu_line_title_601 IN m.huLines AND $neodash_ntg6_hu_market_title_602 IN m.markets RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.huLines AS `HU lines`, m.dialogName AS `Dialog name`, m.markets AS Markets, m.modelLines AS `Model lines`

subReports.title: Select SW version
subReports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG7_IC_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

subReports.title: Select IC line
subReports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG7_IC_LINE`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 2

settings.helperText: IC line to show modules (Entry or High)

subReports.title: BOOTLOADER
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_BOOTLOADER)-[e:HAS_MODULE_BOOTLOADER_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_BOOTLOADER_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m.icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.title: SOC_APPLICATION
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_APPLICATION)-[e:HAS_MODULE_SOC_APPLICATION_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_APPLICATION_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m.icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.title: SOC_HMI_HUD
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_HMI_HUD)-[e:HAS_MODULE_SOC_HMI_HUD_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_HMI_HUD_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m. icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.title: VIP_APPLICATION
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_VIP_APPLICATION)-[e:HAS_MODULE_VIP_APPLICATION_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_VIP_APPLICATION_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m.icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.title: VIP_SW_SPECIFIC_DATA_SET
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_VIP_SW_SPECIFIC_DATA_SET)-[e:HAS_MODULE_VIP_SW_SPECIFIC_DATA_SET_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_VIP_SW_SPECIFIC_DATA_SET_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m.icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_AR_HUD)-[e:HAS_MODULE_SOC_AR_HUD_PARTNUMBER]->(m:NTG7_IC_MODULE_SOC_AR_HUD_PARTNUMBER) WHERE n.title = $neodash_ntg7_ic_sw_title_500 AND $neodash_ntg7_ic_line_title_501 IN m.icLines RETURN m.partNumber AS `Part number`, m.ywp AS `Year/week.patch`, m.icLines AS `IC lines`, m.priority AS `Flash priority` ORDER BY m.priority

subReports.title: Select NTG7 HU SW version
subReports.query: MATCH (n:`NTG7_HU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: NTG7 HU SW version to show update relationships requiring it

subReports.title: All update relationships requiring the NTG7 HU SW
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(m:NTG7_IC_SW) WHERE $neodash_ntg7_hu_sw_title_300 IN e.requiredNTG7HUSW RETURN n, e, m

subReports.title: Select TCU SW version
subReports.query: MATCH (n:`TCU_SW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: TCU SW version to show update relationships requiring it

subReports.title: All update relationships requiring the TCU SW
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(m:NTG7_IC_SW) WHERE $neodash_tcu_sw_title_301 IN e.requiredTCUSW RETURN n, e, m

subReports.title: Select TCU HW version
subReports.query: MATCH (n:`TCU_HW`) WHERE toLower(toString(n.`title`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) RETURN DISTINCT n.`title` as value LIMIT 5

settings.helperText: TCU HW version to show update relationships requiring it

subReports.title: All update relationships requiring the TCU HW
subReports.query: MATCH (n:NTG7_IC_SW)-[e:UPDATES_TO]->(m:NTG7_IC_SW) WHERE $neodash_tcu_hw_title_302 IN e.requiredTCUHW RETURN n, e, m
